Welcome to the NCI Data Training Page¶

Welcome to NCI’s Data Training page, where you can find out information about NCI’s data collection and services. We provide a series of jupyter notebooks examples for your interests.

  • Overview
    • Introduction
    • Training request form
    • Training index page
  • Upcoming training events
    • GEOHACK, 2-4 Nov, 2019
    • ALCS, 5 Nov, 2019
    • Australian Climate and Water Summer Institute, early 2020
  • Training slides list

  • Setup Python environment on the VDI
